help.intro:
Looks like you need some help..
Am I right? (type 'yes' or 'no')
--

BTW, our support email is hello@rewardy.co
Feel free to shoot us an email about everything
help.no_help_needed:
Ok
Getting back to main menu
help.leave_question:
No representative is available at the moment.
We will send you the response to your email (%s).
Please write your message:
help.fill_email: what is the email address you want to receive the answer at?
help.no_valid_mail: This email address is not valid, please type again
help.message_received:
Thank you
your message has been received
help.confirm_sending:
Do you want to send this message to support?
Please reply 'yes' or 'no'
help.error_sending_email:
Error occured while trying to send the message to the support
Please try again.
